page.title: 14Blackridge Civic Week
page.content: The Civic Week is to raise funds for Blackridge{Gala-day. }There are things for nearly all ages. For the boys there is a{B.M.X. {Competition}and 6-a-side football. For the women there is ladies' football and netball. For the men there is football. There is a{streetfair,} with lots of stalls. Anyone can have a stall as long as they are providing whatever they are selling. The things for the girls are netball, a talent competition and discos. There are things for adults such as a{car rally}, a sing song, darts and pool competitions. There is a pram- race and a yard of ale. There's a bowls competition and quiz for the O.A.P.'s. The winners get presented with their prizes on the day of the Gala-day itself.
